1285580.name: Queens Garden: Sakura Season
1285580.description:
Experience the Beauty of Japan in Bloom!

It's Sakura Season, and the Queen is ready to celebrate. But a garden this grand needs a masterâ€™s touch. Step into the role of the royal landscape architect in Queen's Garden 4: Sakura Season, a relaxing yet challenging Match-3 adventure.

From the first cherry blossom to the final stone path, you will guide Queen Ayame and the loyal minister Haruo as they transform a blank canvas into a floral masterpiece. Whether you are looking for a peaceful escape or a strategic puzzle challenge, this journey through ancient Japan offers something for everyone.

Design, Build, and Relax In this installment of the beloved franchise, your puzzle-solving skills directly impact the world around you. Every level cleared brings you closer to new plants, majestic fountains, and traditional Japanese ornaments.

Key Features:

  • ğŸŒ¸ Over 120 Hand-Crafted Levels: Journey through 120 challenging Match-3 boards with unique mechanics and increasing difficulty.

  • ğŸ¡ Total Creative Freedom: Fully customize your garden! Choose where to place plants, decorations, and exotic features to create your personal Zen space.

  • ğŸ® Engaging Mini-Games: Take a break from the main boards with rewarding bonus mini-games that add variety to your gameplay.

  • ğŸ¾ A Living World: Watch as your garden comes to life with animals that visit your sanctuary as it grows.

  • ğŸ’ Resource Management: Collect special jewels and coins to purchase premium decorations and rare flora.

  • âœ¨ Visual & Auditory Bliss: Immerse yourself in the vibrant colors of the Sakura season accompanied by a soothing, atmospheric soundtrack.
